Uses of Class
it.polimi.se2018.model.PlacementRuleDecorator

  • Packages that use PlacementRuleDecorator 
    Package Description
    it.polimi.se2018.model  

    • Uses of PlacementRuleDecorator in it.polimi.se2018.model

      Subclasses of PlacementRuleDecorator in it.polimi.se2018.model 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AdjacentColorPlacementRuleDecorator
      PlacementRule decorator to enforce the following rule: A dice may never be placed orthogonally adjacent to a die of the same color.
      class  AdjacentDicePlacementRuleDecorator
      PlacementRule decorator to enforce the following rule: a dice must be adjacent to a previously placed die, orthogonally or diagonally.
      class  AdjacentValuePlacementRuleDecorator
      PlacementRule decorator to enforce the following rule: A dice may never be placed orthogonally adjacent to a die of the same value.
      class  BorderPlacementRuleDecorator
      PlacementRule decorator to enforce the following rule: A dice can only be placed on an edge or corner space.
      class  ColorPlacementRuleDecorator
      PlacementRule decorator to enforce the following rule: A dice must match color restriction of the space.
      class  ColorRestrictionPlacementRuleDecorator
      PlacementRule decorator to enforce the following rule: A dice must be of the argument specified in the constructor.
      class  NotAdjacentDicePlacementRuleDecorator
      PlacementRule decorator to enforce the following rule: a dice must NOT be adjacent to a previously placed die, orthogonally or diagonally.
      class  ValuePlacementRuleDecorator
      PlacementRule decorator to enforce the following rule: A dice must match value restriction of the space.
